short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Umbrella Academy wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD The Umbrella Academy background. Created for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle The Umbrella Academy wallpapers with every new tab opened.
2. Randomize or favorite The Umbrella Academy wallpapers in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar for easy browsing.
4. Quick access to emails and social media accounts.
5. Auto-updating display of current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Convenient access to frequently visited websites.
8. Quick link to bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Easy access to Google apps.
11. Quick link to explore more themes.
12. Seamless sharing options to social media.
13. Download wallpaper with a single click.
14. Play games directly from the new tab.
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks for an interactive The Umbrella Academy new tab experience.
